queryDetail.value: SELECT DISTINCT PUB_p_partner.p_partner_key_n AS StaffPartnerKey, PUB_p_partner.p_partner_short_name_c AS PartnerName, PUB_p_partner.p_language_code_c AS FirstLanguage, PUB_p_person.p_gender_c AS Gender, PUB_p_person.p_marital_status_c AS MaritalStatus, PUB_p_person.p_date_of_birth_d AS DateOfBirth, PUB_p_person.p_field_key_n AS p_field_key_n, PUB_p_person.p_family_key_n AS FamilyKey, PUB_p_person.p_title_c AS p_title, PUB_p_person.p_first_name_c AS p_first_name, PUB_p_person.p_middle_name_1_c AS p_middle_name_1, PUB_p_person.p_family_name_c AS p_family_name, PUB_p_person.p_prefered_name_c AS p_prefered_name FROM PUB_p_partner, PUB_p_person

, PUB_m_extract, PUB_m_extract_master WHERE PUB_p_partner.p_partner_key_n = PUB_m_extract.p_partner_key_n AND PUB_m_extract.m_extract_id_i = PUB_m_extract_master.m_extract_id_i AND PUB_m_extract_master.m_extract_name_c = {param_extract}

SELECT PUB_p_person.p_date_of_birth_d AS FamilyDOB, PUB_p_partner.p_partner_key_n AS FamilyPartnerKey, PUB_p_partner.p_partner_short_name_c AS FamilyName FROM PUB_p_partner, PUB_p_person WHERE PUB_p_person.p_family_key_n = {FamilyKey} AND PUB_p_partner.p_partner_key_n = PUB_p_person.p_partner_key_n AND PUB_p_partner.p_partner_key_n <> {StaffPartnerKey}

SELECT PUB_pm_passport_details.pm_passport_number_c, PUB_pm_passport_details.pm_full_passport_name_c, PUB_pm_passport_details.pm_passport_details_type_c, PUB_pm_passport_details.pm_date_of_expiration_d, PUB_pm_passport_details.p_passport_nationality_code_c, PUB_pm_passport_details.pm_passport_dob_d, PUB_pm_passport_details.pm_place_of_birth_c, PUB_pm_passport_details.pm_date_of_issue_d, PUB_pm_passport_details.pm_place_of_issue_c, PUB_p_person.p_date_of_birth_d FROM PUB_pm_passport_details, PUB_p_person WHERE PUB_pm_passport_details.p_partner_key_n = {StaffPartnerKey} AND PUB_p_person.p_partner_key_n = {StaffPartnerKey}

SELECT PUB_pm_document.pm_doc_code_c, PUB_pm_document.pm_document_id_c, PUB_pm_document.pm_date_of_start_d, PUB_pm_document.pm_date_of_issue_d, PUB_pm_document.pm_date_of_expiration_d, PUB_pm_document.pm_place_of_issue_c, PUB_pm_document.pm_assoc_doc_id_c, PUB_pm_document.pm_doc_comment_c, PUB_pm_document.pm_contact_partner_key_n FROM PUB_pm_document WHERE PUB_pm_document.p_partner_key_n = {StaffPartnerKey}
SELECT PUB_p_partner.p_partner_short_name_c AS ContactPartnerName FROM PUB_p_partner WHERE PUB_p_partner.p_partner_key_n = {pm_contact_partner_key_n}

SELECT PUB_pm_special_need.pm_medical_comment_c, PUB_pm_special_need.pm_dietary_comment_c, PUB_pm_special_need.pm_other_special_need_c, PUB_pm_special_need.pm_vegetarian_flag_l, PUB_p_partner.p_partner_key_n FROM PUB_p_partner LEFT JOIN PUB_pm_special_need ON PUB_pm_special_need.p_partner_key_n = {StaffPartnerKey} WHERE PUB_p_partner.p_partner_key_n = {StaffPartnerKey}

SELECT PUB_pm_person_ability.pt_ability_area_name_c, PUB_pm_person_ability.pt_ability_level_i, PUB_pm_person_ability.pm_years_of_experience_i, PUB_pm_person_ability.pm_years_of_experience_as_of_d, PUB_pt_ability_level.pt_ability_level_descr_c FROM PUB_pm_person_ability, PUB_pt_ability_level WHERE PUB_pm_person_ability.p_partner_key_n = {StaffPartnerKey} AND PUB_pt_ability_level.pt_ability_level_i = PUB_pm_person_ability.pt_ability_level_i

SELECT PUB_pm_person_language.pm_years_of_experience_i, PUB_pm_person_language.pm_years_of_experience_as_of_d, PUB_pm_person_language.pt_language_level_i, PUB_pt_language_level.pt_language_level_descr_c, PUB_p_language.p_language_description_c FROM PUB_pm_person_language, PUB_p_language, PUB_pt_language_level WHERE PUB_pm_person_language.p_partner_key_n = {StaffPartnerKey} AND PUB_pm_person_language.pt_language_level_i = PUB_pt_language_level.pt_language_level_i AND PUB_pm_person_language.p_language_code_c = PUB_p_language.p_language_code_c
